p: Table 2 shows the results of the chromatographic analysis of 24 h reactions, showing the percentage of acyl-glycerides, free fatty acids, and methyl esters. The free enzyme and the variant immobilized on the AMNP-GA carrier kept high amounts of triglycerides, AG1-GA-OPEr accumulated some diglycerides, and the non-covalent preparation SiMAG-octyl-OPEr showed to have nearly 15% free fatty acids at the final reaction time.
